comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: There is something strange about the token economics where 20% of the team token will be unlocked immediately and the public sale will be unlocked after 3 years with a 6 month interval between each unlocked portion. Are you confident that this will be attractive to investors ?

comments.author: VanDeinsberg12
comments.body: Quote from: royalfestus on March 02, 2023, 10:57:53 AMThere is something strange about the token economics where 20% of the team token will be unlocked immediately and the public sale will be unlocked after 3 years with a 6 month interval between each unlocked portion. Are you confident that this will be attractive to investors ?Whut? where did you see that? Have you ever visited its tokenomic whitepaper? If it's like that and there will be investors who will be interested to invest in this project. The tokenomic paper said the opposite thing like what you have said above. Can you clarify that?

comments.author: irfan_pak10
comments.body: Quote from: VanDeinsberg12 on March 03, 2023, 04:51:06 PMQuote from: royalfestus on March 02, 2023, 10:57:53 AMThere is something strange about the token economics where 20% of the team token will be unlocked immediately and the public sale will be unlocked after 3 years with a 6 month interval between each unlocked portion. Are you confident that this will be attractive to investors ?Whut? where did you see that? Have you ever visited its tokenomic whitepaper? If it's like that and there will be investors who will be interested to invest in this project. The tokenomic paper said the opposite thing like what you have said above. Can you clarify that? Exactly, the token economics doc is saying otherwise. Please visit the token economics here: https://docs.secondlive.world/tokenomics/tokenomics
